onboarding.slide1Description: Koresha interface yoroshye, ifite indimi nyinshi yakozwe ishyirwa mu bitekerezo abahinzi.
onboarding.slide2Description: Koresha telefoni yawe gusuzuma ibihingwa no kubona isuzuma ryihuse kandi ryizerwa rikoresheje AI.
onboarding.slide3Description: Sangira uburambe, kubona inama, no kwiga ku bandi mu rwunge rw'ubuhinzi rwawe rwo mu gace.

help.subject: Ikijyanye

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.subtitle: Shaka ibisubizo ku bibazo bisanzwe ku porogaramu yacu
faq.a1: AgriModel ni platform yuzuye yashyiriweho kugira ngo ifashe abahinzi kunoza imikorere yabo y'ubuhinzi binyuze mu bitekerezo bishingiye ku makuru, kugenzura ibihe, no guhinisha uburyo burambye.
faq.a2: Kugira ngo ukore konti, kurikirana porogaramu yacu, kanda kuri 'Iyandikishe' ku kirarane cyo kwinjira, kandi ukurikire amabwiriza yo kwiyandikisha n'imeyili yawe n'amakuru yawe bwite.
faq.a3: Yego, dufata umutekano w'amakuru by'umwihariko. Amakuru yawe yose arahindurwa kandi abikwa mu buryo bwizewe hakurikijwe imigenzereze myiza y'uruganda.
faq.a4: Yego, ibikorwa byinshi bya porogaramu birakora bidahujwe. Amakuru yawe azahuzwa ukurikije igihe usubiye guhuza ku nterente.
faq.a5: Ku kirahure cyo kwinjira, kanda 'Kwibagirwa Ijambo ry'ibanga' kandi ukurikize amabwiriza yoherejwe ku aderesi yawe ya imeyili yanditse.
faq.a6: Yego, ikipe yacu y'ubufasha irahari binyuze kuri imeyili, telefoni, cyangwa binyuze ku gice cy'ubufasha muri porogaramu kugira ngo igufashe ku bibazo byose.

terms.title: Amabwiriza
terms.section1_content: Murakaza neza kuri AgriModel. Aya mabwiriza agenga ikoreshwa rya porogaramu yacu igendanwa na serivisi. Mu gukoresha porogaramu yacu, wemeye aya mabwiriza yose.
terms.section2_content:
"App" isobanura porogaramu igendanwa ya AgriModel.
"Ukoresha" isobanura umuntu wese ugera cyangwa ukoresha App.
"Ibikubiyemo" bisobanura amakuru yose, amakuru, umwandiko, ibishushanyo, cyangwa ibindi bikoresho bigaragara ku App.
terms.section3_content:
3.1 Kugira ngo ukoreshe ibice bimwe by'App, ushobora gukeneye gukora konti y'ukoresha.
3.2 Uri umunyamwuga wo kubika ibanga ry'ibiranga konti yawe.
3.3 Wemeye gutanga amakuru yuzuye kandi yuzuye mu gihe cyo kurema konti yawe.
3.4 Uri wenyine ufite inshingano ku bikorwa byose biba ku konte yawe.
terms.section4_content: Politiki yacu y'ibanga isobanura uburyo dufata amakuru uduha iyo ukoresha App yacu. Mu gukoresha App, wemeye ko dushobora gukusanya, gukoresha, no gusangira amakuru yawe hakurikijwe Politiki y'Ibanga.
terms.section5_content:
Wemeye kutakoresha App ku gira ngo:
5.1 Kurenga amategeko cyangwa amabwiriza akurikizwa.
5.2 Kwangiza uburenganzira bw'abandi.
5.3 Kohereza ibikoresho byose byangiza, birakaza, cyangwa bitemewe.
5.4 Kubangamira cyangwa guhagarika App cyangwa seriveri cyangwa network zihujwe na App.
5.5 Kugerageza kubona uburenganzira butemewe ku gice icyo ari cyo cyose cya App.
terms.section6_content:
6.1 App n'ibiyikubiyemo, ibikorwa byayo, n'imikorere byacu kandi birinzwe n'amategeko mpuzamahanga y'umwimerere, ikirango, uruhushya, ubucuruzi rwihishe, n'andi mategeko yo kumera neza cyangwa uburenganzira bwo kwirengera.
6.2 Ntushobora gukoporora, guhindura, gukora imirimo yavuye, kwerekana mu ruhame, gukora mu ruhame, kongera gushyira ahagaragara, kumanura, cyangwa gutanga igice icyo ari cyo cyose cya App nta burenganzira bwanditse bwabanjirije.
terms.section7_content: Twibikiye uburenganzira bwo guhindura aya mabwiriza igihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Niba dukora impinduka, tuzakumenyesha dukosora itariki yari hejuru y'aya mabwiriza kandi, mu bimwe, dushobora kukugezaho andi menyesha. Gukomeza gukoresha App nyuma y'impinduka zabonetse bizagaragaza kwemera kwawe impinduka.
terms.section8_content:
Niba ufite ibibazo byerekeye aya mabwiriza, nyamuneka duhamagare kuri:
Imeyili: support@agrimodel.rw
Telefoni: +250 7XX XXX XXX

diagnosis.freeLimitMessage: Wageze ku rugero rwawe rwa buri munsi kuri gahunda y'ubuntu. Ese wifuza kuzamuka?

diagnosis.step1Text: Menya neza ko igice cy'ikimera cyoroshye kiboneka neza kandi kiza.
diagnosis.step2Text: Ohereza ifoto yawe kandi AI yacu izayisesengura.
diagnosis.step3Text: Kubona kumenya indwara n'inama zo kuvura.
diagnosis.aiCapabilities: AI yacu ishobora kumenya indwara mu bihingwa bitandukanye harimo ikawa n'ibitoke.
diagnosis.noDiseaseMeaning: Sisitemu yacu ntabwo yashoboye kumenya indwara muri iki kimera. Ibi bishobora kuvuga:
diagnosis.noDiseaseReason3: • Indwara ntiri mu bubiko bw'amakuru yacu
diagnosis.shareMessageDetected: Nasanze {{disease}} mu kimera cyanjye {{plant}} nkoresheje porogaramu yo gusuzuma indwara z'ibimera!
